about_the_game:
Epic world
The world is being attacked! Liberika, a world hidden behind huge hills and endless rivers. A world full of secrets, populated by Luchadores, a noble race filled with pride, whose world is fulfilled by fistfights. Born in masks they reflect strength and heritage. Protect their world together with prince El Mucho!

Class System
If the Luchadores gained enough experience, they can choose different paths. Even if the fistfight is the highest form, there is also magic and weapons to explore in their world of Liberika. Choose wisely between the different options of promotion!




Nerve wracking fights
Enjoy the epic fights between the Luchadores and the nasty monsters.



Magic
If a fist is not enough, then magic might help. Some chosen ones are able to master the secret art of magic.



Oscar worthy dialogs
Experience the nerve wracking adventures of El Mucho in high class dialogs. Everything available in English, German or Spanish.



And many more
Experience 16 extensive missions and try to solve the mysterious attacks on Liberika. Quickly hurry up, before the king is dethroned and the entire land will fall apart.

highlighted.name: El Magico has joined the group
La Santa, the saint, is here

legal_notice:
Universal-LPC-spritesheet
Characters based on Universal-LPC-spritesheet and will be published under the CC-BY-SA 3.0 License.

Liberated Pixel Cup styleguide
Environment based on Liberated Pixel Cup styleguide and will be published under the CC-BY-SA 3.0 License.

OpenGameArt
Many Sprites (Effects, Magic, GUI, etc.) is based on "OpenGameArt" projects and will be published under the CC-BY-SA 3.0 License.

Fonts
Fonts are used from 1001Fonts and will be published under the 1001Fonts Free For Commercial Use License (FFC) License.

Map Generation
Map is generated with this open source project "Fantasy-Map-Generator" and will be published under the MIT License.

Music
Creative Commons Music by Jason Shaw on

For more information see the Game Website
name: El Mucho

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5 or AMD Ryzen 3
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia Geforce 960 or similar
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Yes
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i7 or AMD Ryzen 5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia Geforce 1060 or higher
  • Storage: 1000 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Yes

short_description: El Mucho is a round based tactical RPG in a fiction world called Liberika. It is inspired by old classics like Langrisser aka Warsong. El Mucho is all about protecting the world from the attacks of the nasty monsters.
